results.name: Triangular array, read by rows: pairwise sums of trinomial array A027907.
comment: Counting the top row as row 0, T(n,k) is the number of strings of nonnegative integers "s(1)s(2)s(3)...s(k)" such that s(1)+s(2)+s(3)+...+s(k) = n and the string does not contain the substring "00". E.g., T(3,5) = 8 because the valid strings are 02010, 01020, 11010, 10110, 10101, 01110, 01101 and 01011. T(4,3) = 13, counting 040, 311, 301, 130, 031, 103, 013, 220, 202, 022, 211, 121 and 112. - Jose Luis Arregui (arregui(AT)unizar.es), Dec 05 2007
program: (PARI) {T(n, k) = if( k<0 || k>2*n, 0, if(n==0, 1, polcoeff( (1 + x + x^2)^n, k)+ polcoeff( (1 + x + x^2)^(n-1), k-1)))};
